description.english: Defeat the Guardian of the Ore.
Finish a level with 25 health (or less).
Achieve an S rank on any level.
Achieve an A rank (or higher) in Boss Rush Mode.
Hold more than 1,000 credits at once.
Defeat the Guardian of the Ore on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Asteroid Destroyer on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Sorter of Value on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Ecology Keeper on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Deep Space Drill on NG+ without taking damage(entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Warden on NG+ without taking damage(entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Subterranean Fugitive on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Rogue Defender on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Volatile Centrifuge on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Field Scholar on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Mobile Filtration System on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Armament Engineer on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Nuclear Cruiser on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Ancient Archive on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Foreman on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Senatorial Protector on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Lodestar on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Megalithic Gunship on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Fusion Cannon on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Twin Fighters on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Control Mainframe on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Defeat the Terrible Experiment on NG+ without taking damage (entire stage + boss fight).
Kill 50 enemies using the bomb special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the laser special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies with boost in one level.
Finish a level with aim type set to off.
Kill 50 enemies using the scatter special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the orbs special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the rockets special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the cutter special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the homing special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the wave special weapon during one level.
Kill 50 enemies using the vulcan special weapon during one level.
Boost through 10 enemies in a row.
Defeat Galactic Chaos on NG+ without taking damage.
Defeat Galactic Chaos with no ship upgrades.
Defeat the Deep Space Drill without firing a shot (entire stage + boss fight).
Finish all 3 Boost Rush Mode Levels in a row.
Defeat Galactic Chaos on Arcade Mode.
Defeat Galactic Chaos on Arcade Mode using Arcade Controls.
